title: Luminalia, or The festivall of light Personated in a masque at court, by the Queenes Majestie, and her ladies. On Shrovetuesday night, 1637.
author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the flying Horse neere Yorke house,
notes: "The performance was on 6 Feb. 1638, and the dates on the title therefore follow the legal reckoning"--Greg.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
